sqlMap.update: update ftbStatHourGprsBussType_V2 set ftbStatHourGprsBussType_V2.vcParentGroupName = tree.vcParentGroupName from ftbStatHourGprsBussType_V2,( select nmParentId,vcParentGroupName from dtbGroupTree where nmTypeId=1 ) as tree where ftbStatHourGprsBussType_V2.nmParentId = tree.nmParentId and ftbStatHourGprsBussType_V2.vcParentGroupName is null -- and intYear = #intYear# and intMonth = #intMonth# and intWeek = #intWeek# and intDay <= (#intDay#+6) and intHour >= #intHour#
